name: base-project-structure
description: This package.json is used to be the default for all of my Johnny-Five experiments

scripts.start:fade-in: npm run build && t2 run dist/fade-in.js
scripts.start:fade-in-out: npm run build && t2 run dist/fade-in-out.js
scripts.start:cross-fade: npm run build && t2 run dist/cross-fade.js
scripts.start:fader-easing: npm run build && t2 run dist/fader-easing.js
scripts.start:keyframes-fade-in: npm run build && t2 run dist/keyframes-fade-in.js
scripts.start:keyframes-multiple: npm run build && t2 run dist/keyframes-multiple.js
scripts.start: npm run build && t2 run dist/keyframes-multiple.js

author: Matthew Zygowicz
